title: MedievalSword1 SoundEffect
description: This is a MedievalSword sound effects package designed for scenes involving combat in the medieval era, including sounds of drawing swords, swinging blades, and making impactful strikes.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/R0xnIqvizpo


This is a MedievalSword sound effects package designed for scenes involving combat in the medieval era, including sounds of drawing swords, swinging blades, and making impactful strikes.

  • 282 Cue, 282 Audio

  • Scrape 14
  • Swing 15
  • Swing_Ultrasonic 25
  • Throw_Impact 8
  • Unsheathe 15
